aguiaj.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • aguiaj.cards.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the playing cards. Each card has a unique instance.
    Author:
    Andre L. Santos

      • valueOf

        public static Card valueOf(Rank rank,
           Suit suit)
        Obtain a card given a rank and a suit.
        Parameters:
        rank - Rank
        suit - Suit
        Returns:

      • random

        public static Card random()
        Obtains a random card.
        Returns:
        One out of the 52 cards.

      • randomArray

        public static Card[] randomArray(int length)
        Creates an array with random cards.
        Parameters:
        length - Array length
        Returns:
        An array with the given length, possibly with duplicate cards.

      • allCards

        public static Card[] allCards()
        Creates an array with all the cards.
        Returns:
        An array with length 52.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A textual representation of the card. This textual representation can be used to obtain the card using valueOf(String).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
